title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Smartphone-Based Project Learning for Training Dermatology Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and general skin care knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain diagnostic criteria for major skin diseases (atopic dermatitis, acne, eczema, etc.) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can apply step-by-step treatment protocols for skin diseases with 90% accuracy through real-world cases.
Learners can complete a patient case analysis project using a mobile app with 100% success and pass the presentation evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
